head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DOWNING, REGINA C.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DOWNING, REGINA C.

block.p: DOWNING-Regina C. Beloved sister of Mary Sullivan, Hannah O'Shea, Elizabeth Downing, Sr. Katherine, O.P. (Blauvelt, N.Y.) & the late John and Frank Downing and Julie McElligott. Beloved aunt of 6 nephews and 10 grandnieces and grandnephews. Devoted Hibernian (A.O.H.). Family will receive friends Thursday 2 to 4 and 7 to 9PM at Williams Funeral Home, 5628 Broadway at 232nd Street, Bronx. Mass of Christian Burial will be celebrated at Visitation Church, Friday at 10 AM.
